meanings.definition: A substance or treatment used to kill or repel insects.
meanings.sent1: I sprayed the antibug on the plants to keep the insects away.
meanings.sent2: The antibug worked effectively in getting rid of the pesky bugs in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The picnic was saved from the invasion of ants thanks to the trusty antibug spray.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to study hard acted as an antibug, driving away distractions like insects.
meanings.sent5: The antibug spray created an invisible shield around the house, protecting it from any bug intruders.

meanings.definition: A program or software designed to detect and remove computer viruses.
meanings.sent1: He installed the new antibug on his computer to keep it safe from viruses.
meanings.sent2: The company's IT department regularly updates the antibug software to ensure security.
meanings.sent3: The antibug program went on strike, refusing to work until it was given a virtual coffee break.
meanings.sent4: The antibug software acted like a vigilant guard, constantly scanning for any malicious bugs.
meanings.sent5: With the antibug in place, the computer system was as secure as a fortress against digital threats.
